Follow these Steps
 -	 From the Menu in the top Right Corner Press The Edit Profile Option

 -	 Enter Name of Subject in the field provided and press the + button to add the subject to list

 *	 You Can only enter a Maximum of 15 subjects

 -	 After adding all your subjects press the Next Step Button

 -	 Select the Subjects you have on a particular working day. To select press the subject name

 *	 If no class on Saturday do not press any of the subjects

 -	 Press the Save Timetable button to finalise timetable creation

 -	 Now go back to main menu and press Update button

 -	 Select the timetable from the drop down menu

 -	 List of subjects for that day will be listed, press the subjects that were attended and if absent do not press any of the buttons

 -	 Click the Submit Attendance

 -	 To Check the current attendance status, press the Status Button

 *	 You can wipe all your attendance data permanently by pressing the Wipe Data Option


##	 You can Also choose to enter attendance for Single Subject, just select the option in the Update Layout

 ##	 Saving of Absent Dates is Also possible, just select the option in the Update Layout

 ##	 Absent Dates Can be Viewed by Selecting the Option Show Absent Dates
